General Symptoms: Are you experiencing a persistent cough?
Do you have nasal congestion or a runny nose?
Are you experiencing shortness of breath or difficulty breathing?
Are you feeling unusually tired or fatigued?
Have you recently lost your sense of taste or smell?
Have you been in close contact with anyone who has tested positive for a contagious illness in the past 7 days?
Additional Symptoms: Do you have a sore throat?
Are you experiencing muscle pain or body aches?
